short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The user helper program to load a website directly from browser to mobile using QR Code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Share is a programme which can be used to share the url of the website with the mobile device using QR Code. You can just use any QR Code scanner to get the link. We use google API to generate QR Code. Get your website on your mobile device in the fastest way possible.
